${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:MoneyBuysEverything.NAME: Money Buys Everything!
${modID}:MoneyBuysEverything.Flavor: In a world which money is of utmost importance, the richest is the strongest.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yStrength for every #b99 #yGold you have.
